Internet of Things

White Paper

SpartenWare simplifies Internet Of Things Solution


"Our clients appliances are connected to the Internet with smart modules, allowing users to control home electronics from anywhere. " -Cindy Barnes,Sales Director, FxAll

In this connected world, the proliferation of intelligent devices has created a market for entirely new solutions based on Internet of Things (IoT) technology. With the ever-increasing amount of data that is inherent in an IoT world, the key to gaining real business value is effective communication among all elements of the architecture.

Only Spartenware's Internet of Things platform delivers an integrated, secure, comprehensive platform for the entire IoT architecture across all vertical markets.


"With IoT, you can really look at how the customer looks at an experience: from when I'm walking through a store, buying a product, and using it" -Albert Shum, Director of Engineering KZing

With Spartenware, your organization's IoT initiatives gain:

  1. Real-time response capabilities for millions of device endpoints.
  2. Faster time to market.
  3. End-to-end security.
  4. Integration with IT systems.
  5. A worldwide, coordinated ecosystem of partners.
